text: Peter Yariyok Jatau (5 August 1931 â€“ 16 December 2020) was a Nigerian Roman Catholic archbishop. Jatau was born in Lagos, Nigeria. He became a priest in 1963. He was coadjutor archbishop of the Roman Catholic Archdiocese of Kaduna, Nigeria, from 1972 to 1975 and as archbishop of the archdiocese from 1975 to 2007. Jatau died on 16 December 2020 at the age of 89. ==References== Category:1931 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Nigerian Roman Catholic bishops Category:Roman Catholic archbishops
title: Peter Yariyok Jatau
